name: chiado-nethermind.dnp.dappnode.eth
description: Chiado Nethermind is a execution layer (EL) client for running the Gnosis longterm testnet `Chiado`, Nethermind is a high-performance, highly configurable full Ethereum protocol client built on .NET that runs on Linux, Windows, and macOS, and supports Clique, Aura, Ethash, and Proof-of-Stake consensus algorithms.
author: DAppNode Association <admin@dappnode.io> (https://github.com/dappnode)

exposable.name: Nethermind Chiado JSON RPC
exposable.description: JSON RPC endpoint for Nethermind Chiado testnet

exposable.name: Nethermind Chiado JSON RPC (WS)
exposable.description: JSON RPC WebSocket endpoint for Nethermind Chiado testnet
